Note, the code in the README is the singleplayer optimized version of this code breakdown. DO NOT USE IN COMBINATION WITH IT!
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
$Advanced Full Widescreen v5 with UI/GNCP Code for PAL [dreamsyntax, Dolphin Wiki]

3DC03F40 91C22000
C2222000 EC110032
D0030004 00000000

C0822000 00000000

Ported (Gecko only version) for PAL; Accounts for caller checks shifted and memory regions aligning with PAL, including Junk memory mapping
$GNCP Alignments and Lock On and Mission UI
